title: Don't let last year's allstar champ vote happen again!!!

replies.body: Team Ice doesn't even look bad with their CC overload, and swap out Kayle and either Annie/Leona for a proper bot and you're set to go for fire.
Why not Phoenix Quinn as ADC? Then you could have Kayle top, Shyvana jungle, Brand mid, Leona support. :3
Replace Kayle with Rumble & boom,we would have had matching votes.

Do they still do pros vs casters/rioters? I miss those matches. Pros get the worst comp of all supports that they could come up w/ and the casters get the strongest meta comp they feel like picking, and the pros win any way. Maybe it doesn't work any more w/ all the retired pros casting, but it was funny and really interesting to watch bc it was somewhat balanced but you really saw what could be done by abusing champ/game knowledge rather than having a good match up or strong champ.
Pretty dang funny. And I agree. Upvoted.

allow me to quote the top comment from the pick ten results announcement last year:

 "The community fucking sucks at picking champions"
How many upvotes?
lol thanks. i want the link now lol
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-event/all-star-pick-10-results-are

>I mean clearly your just voting up same champ as last year or most of em

Wat? This post is literally about NOT picking the same champs.

Oh well mb LOL
Thought you were voting for those champs
this is what reading skills are for.
That ia actually mentioned on the boxes for pokemon games
replace trist with kalista and you got it. also need to replace Illaoi becuase you cant even vote for her. might i suggest fiora or riven?

I edited and left Trist in because shes a really obnoxious hyper carry with bs damage that has little counterplay, just like her AP counterpart used to be.
Also fiora because muh big riposte plays
true, their trist always has rocket jump, but the ones we get never do XD
Team Ice : {{champion:22}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:113}}  Hands down

I mean.... {{champion:127}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:201}} 
is the team that I want for ice.
Logged in to upvote this. Yes please, this is what I want to see!
Vote Galio on Faker

While I do tend to agree with this sentiment, I believe it may start a war of votes between the non-meta vs the people that may want to see people like Faker playing their best champion they are famous for.  It can also be hard to get people to agree on what champion to even vote for in relation to this unless some giant reddit thread comes up or something basically telling all of League to "make Faker play Galio" etc.  Votes would not even be consistent.  In the end stuff like Thresh may just win regardless for a support.  Other votes may get thrown away.  It would be like trying to get everyone in this thread to vote for a pizza with the topping they want.  I support this, I really do, but I kept my votes to each champion playing their strongest champs they are famous for to see this game played at its highest skill level.  I believe it would be hard to convince everyone to put Galios, Yorricks, and Poppy in these kind of games.  Plus I fear that overwhelming Teemo vote.

My Votes as of now:
**Pick 10**
{{summoner:14}} - {{champion:68}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:53}} VS
{{summoner:32}} - {{champion:57}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:12}} 

**ALL STAR**
{{summoner:14}} Dyrus, Score, Faker, Doublelift, Madlife
{{summoner:32}} Huni, Clearlove, Rookie, Uzi, Pyl

**SKIN**

so basically you want them to play every champion that's already commonly played. Boy are you fun.

I don't really ever see (at least in my matches) any of them except Vayne and Blitzcrank frequently. I see Rumble like twice a month, haven't played with or against Rek'Sai for 2 months, LeBlanc was three weeks ago, Corki was two weeks ago, and Maokai was a month ago.

Evelynn, Azir, and Alistair or kinda common-ish? but I really only see Vayne and Blitz out of those 10 often.

Personally I'd like to see some {{champion:8}} or {{champion:127}} action.
how about u let people pick what they want to see

I'm not "forcing" anyone to do what I want, I'm saying that it would be a disappointment if we have to see the same old champions again and again, but hey man, if you want to see {{champion:114}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:67}} and {{champion:412}}  vs {{champion:114}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:67}} and {{champion:412}} again then go for it dude.
Where do we vote for this? I haven't seen anything about a vote yet.
Can I PLEASE see how {{champion:3}} is played at a professional level!!!??

I voted 
{{champion:44}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:33}} 
for both teams. 
Crosses fingers for faker on yorick or taric

Riot will gut malz for it. not like they dont want to do it already though

I was just going to make a post about this as soon as I saw voting up. Though to be fair, they only picked vayne cuz they wanted double on vayne, not so much for the meta. Anivia for froggen obviously as well. Please guys don't vote for leblanc on faker, vote for something uncommon. I'm voting for Swain and Singed for sure, I'll post when I decide on the rest.
I really want to see Faker play {{champion:3}}

I wanna see someone play swain, my main, biased ofc. Since there are actually really good midlaners at allstars, might finally get to see him played well. The only time I've seen Swain win is when Soaz picked him. He's been rekt every other time he's appeared on the rift.

"Champ with the most votes will get a fire or ice themed skin."
Satan Teemo skin inbound

I see it happening, but personally I'd love to see a fire or ice skin for Diana. Plus Teemo has a lot of skins and Diana is I think the oldest champion to have 2 skins. Hell, Gnar will soon have his THIRD skin and he's been out a year. Ekko got his second less than half a year after his release. Bard is getting his second in a couple weeks. I just really want that Diana skin.
No one remember {{champion:83}}
Good point. But he hasn't gotten a new skin because almost no one plays him and Riot has ironically basically buried the gravedigger.
It's not because no one play him it's because he needs a rework or so I've heard.
his model also isn't the nicest to make a skin for right now. Not too much to really work with on a champ that is barely played, has a somewhat bad model and is probably slated for a rework
